name: AHG Term Browse
description: High-performance term browse (subjects, places, genres) using Laravel Query Builder and direct ES queries. Replaces base AtoM term index that causes N+1 query hangs.
author: The Archive and Heritage Group
features: Term browse via direct ES HTTP queries (no Elastica)
Batch facet population (single query instead of N+1)
Compatible with theme term templates and partials
